applet_name: Automatically sync your Musixmatch favorited tracks to your Soundcloud
applet_description:
Favorite a track on Musixmatch to automatically add
it to your liked tracks on Soundcloud

applet_name: Automatically sync your Spotify saved tracks to your Soundcloud
applet_description: Save a track on Spotify to automatically add it to your liked tracks on Soundcloud.

applet_name: Upload your tracks to Soundcloud from your Dropbox
applet_description: Add your track files to a Dropbox folder of your choice to have them automatically uploaded to your Soundcloud profile

applet_name: Get an email when your fave celeb is featured on a track
applet_description: There's approx 1 billon podcasts out there â€” which one will your favorite author/speaker/actor/celeb end up on next? This Applet will search track titles and if your fave's name is in it, send you an email so you don't miss out.  ðŸ‘Š ðŸŽ‰

applet_name: Automatically sync your Soundcloud likes to your Spotify
applet_description: Like a track on Soundcloud to add it to your Spotify My Music collection (subject to track availability; this will add the first search result to your Spotify library).

applet_name: Save the tracks you like on SoundCloud to a Spotify playlist
applet_description: This Applet will search on Spotify for the tracks you like on SoundCloud and add to a "SoundCloud Likes" playlist. NOTE: not all songs on SoundCloud are available on Spotify.

applet_name: Automatically save public tracks by artists you follow on Soundcloud in Spotify
applet_description: Sync your Soundcloud favorites with your Spotify saves. When an artist you follow adds a new public track, this Applet will search the title on Spotify. If it finds it, it'll add it to Your Music.
applet_Trigger: New public track by anyone you follow

applet_name: Add SoundCloud feed to Spotify playlist
applet_description: Add tracks from users you follow on SoundCloud to a Spotify playlist.
applet_Trigger: New public track by anyone you follow

applet_name: Download new songs you like to Google Drive
applet_description: Automatically download new songs you like on SoundCloud directly to Google Drive. *Note* this works only on tracks that are publicly available for download.

applet_name: Amazon echo sound
applet_description: Amazon echo

applet_name: Infinite Music List
applet_description: #soundcloud #drive #music #favorites

applet_name: Download new songs you like to Dropbox
applet_description:
Automatically download your new favorite songs directly to Dropbox. 
*Note* this works only on tracks that are publicly available for download.

applet_name: Share new SoundCloud uploads to Tumblr
applet_description: Share your new SoundCloud uploads to Tumblr automatically when you post a new public track.

applet_name: Download new songs you like to OneDrive
applet_description: Automatically download new songs you like on SoundCloud directly to OneDrive. *Note* this works only on tracks that are publicly available for download.

applet_description: Create a Soundcloud account, follow podcasts you enjoy, use IFTTT to send a text to the phone number you specify when a new podcast is available!

applet_description: Email a track as an attachment to trigger@recipe.ifttt.com and it will be automatically published to your SoundCloud as a public track.

applet_name: SoundCloud liked songs journal
applet_description: Create journal entry when like a public song on SoundCloud
